subject: Baseball
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: After a Red Sox-Yankees argument spilled outside a bar, a Yankees fan aimed her car at a group of people to scare them and did not brake, hitting and killing a man, the authorities and witnesses said.
snippet: After a Red Sox-Yankees argument spilled outside a bar, a Yankees fan aimed her car at a group of people to scare them and did not brake, hitting and killing a man, the authorities and witnesses said.
